survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Online Grocery Delivery Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather customer feedback on their experience with online grocery delivery services to identify areas for improvement and measure overall satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How often do you use online grocery delivery services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for ease of selection. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How often do you use online grocery delivery services?

questions.question_text: Which online grocery delivery services have you used in the past 3 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional entries.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which online grocery delivery services have you used in the past 3 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing an online grocery delivery service? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Limit selections to 3 options. Use checkboxes with a validation rule for max selections.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with validation for max 3 selections.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing an online grocery delivery service? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of your most recent online grocery delivery?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Ensure the scale is clearly labeled for consistency.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of your most recent online grocery delivery?

questions.question_text: What was the primary reason for your satisfaction or dissatisfaction with your most recent online grocery delivery experience?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What was the primary reason for your satisfaction or dissatisfaction with your most recent online grocery delivery experience?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the online grocery delivery service you used most recently to a friend or family member?
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 is not 'Less than once a month'
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. This question is a good indicator of Net Promoter Score (NPS).
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button (SINGLE_CHOICE). Apply routing logic based on Q1 response.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the online grocery delivery service you used most recently to a friend or family member?
script.routing_logic: Shown if Q1 is not 'Less than once a month'

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for online grocery delivery services?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather actionable feedback. Encourage detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for online grocery delivery services?
